q1.questionText: How many times will the loop `for i from 0 to 10` execute?

q2.questionText:
What will the value of sum be at the end of the following execution? 
sum = 0 
for i from 1 to 5: sum += 1

q3.questionText: Fill in the blanks to repeat the loop 10 times: for , from , to , .

q5.questionText:
For which value pairs will the following loop iterate 5 times: 
i = ? 
while(i < b) i += 1
